FuncDef: The ptp asymmetry-correction command sets the asymmetrical delay correction value on a 1588v2 interface. The undo ptp asymmetry-correction command cancels the configured asymmetrical delay correction value on a 1588v2 interface. By default, the asymmetrical delay correction value is not configured on a 1588v2 interface. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H-48S6CQ, CE6881H-48S6CQ-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE interface view,400GE interface view,50GE interface view

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the negative asymmetrical delay correction value.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 2000000, in nanoseconds.

Indicates the positive asymmetrical delay correction value.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 2000000, in nanoseconds.
